isLinked.name: isLinked

trigger.name: trigger
trigger.summary: The function used by the db trigger
trigger.description: This will basically execute the history query if it's configured for.

description_parts.content: This will basically execute the history query if it's configured for.

doc.description:
The function used by the db trigger
This will basically execute the history query if it's configured for.

internal.text: param array "where" key/value array of fields names and fields values identifying the row

trigger.comments:
/**
   * The function used by the db trigger
   * This will basically execute the history query if it's configured for.
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @internal param string "table" The table for which the history is called
   * @internal param string "kind" The type of action: select|update|insert|delete
   * @internal param string "moment" The moment according to the db action: before|after
   * @internal param array "values" key/value array of fields names and fields values selected/inserted/updated
   * @internal param array "where" key/value array of fields names and fields values identifying the row
   * @return array The $cfg array, modified or not
   *
   */

dbTraitSelection.name: dbTraitSelection
dbTraitSelection.summary: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Offset of the first row to return.

doc.description: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.

params.name: $limit
params.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

params.name: $start
params.description: Offset of the first row to return.

dbTraitSelection.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.
   *
   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.
   * @param array $order Order by conditions.
   * @param int $limit Maximum number of rows to return.
   * @param int $start Offset of the first row to return.
   * @param string $mode The mode of result ('array', 'object', 'value').
   * @param array $fields Fields to select.
   *
   * @return array The result set.
   */

dbTraitGetRequestCfg.name: dbTraitGetRequestCfg
dbTraitGetRequestCfg.summary: Prepares the request configuration for a database query.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Offset of the first row to return.

doc.description: Prepares the request configuration for a database query.

params.name: $limit
params.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

params.name: $start
params.description: Offset of the first row to return.

throws.description: If the table index is not defined or a field does not exist.

dbTraitGetRequestCfg.comments:
/**
   * Prepares the request configuration for a database query.
   *
   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.
   * @param array $order Order by conditions.
   * @param int $limit Maximum number of rows to return.
   * @param int $start Offset of the first row to return.
   * @param array $fields Fields to select.
   *
   * @return array The request configuration.
   * @throws Exception If the table index is not defined or a field does not exist.
   */

doc.description: Additional conditions when querying the history table
@var Db The DB connection
@var database The database class which collects the columns IDs
@var null|string Name of the database where the history table is
@var boolean Setting it to false avoid execution of history triggers
@var float The current date can be overwritten if this variable is set
@var string|null User's ID
@var array A collection of DB connections
@var array The foregin links atytached to history UIDs' table
@var array A collection of DB connections
@var string Object hash based on configuration
@var array $class_cfg
@var bool
@var array
@var string
@var string
